name: Parkour Bean
description:
Hi! Thank you so much for taking interest in my game! I am a new developer who has recently started learning how to use Unity and C# and I am putting together my first ever game!

This is the demo v0.1 and its expected to have bugs. The build has been tested to make sure it actually works and you can use the stuff inside. I will soon be creating a steam page and anyone that tries my demo here will receive a free key on release of the main build. 

Please contact me about any bugs you find or encounter on my discord server!

Again thank you so much for showing interest!

Discord: https://discord.gg/p7VxESTG
